ygData.subject: Re: Re: Icy Greaves
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I was doing those dw s the other day with my regular group on the Tribunal. I used harmony (I m a L40 druid on Tribunal now, my bard on tarrew marr is on
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, Dec 01/99, James Schuldes <jgs@...> wrote:

> TBH - I don't know how they broke that spawn. I think they were doing Specs
> and maybe someone else trained some dw's up to the shore. Prolly hadda mez a
> bunch and they killed em off to break the spawn. After that - the SK ran in
> to the water and dragged em up one or 2 at a time.
>

I was doing those dw's the other day with my regular group on the
Tribunal. I used harmony (I'm a L40 druid on Tribunal now, my bard on
tarrew marr is on vacation) and was easily able to pull singles for a
while. Unfortunately I had the bright idea of moving the fight
underwater so we could get used to underwater fighting for our planned
trip to Kedge. Also unfortunately, one of the people we'd added to our
regular group wandered (swam) a bit too close to the tower while we were
fighting one I pulled and we got 4 on us. Everyone lived but me, who got
cast on by 4 of them after healing our tank. But, it is doable. I think
just our regular group of 4 40's could have done it if someone hadn't
blundered into agro range.
>
> p.s. only other DW pull - a ranger swam into the cave and tried to pull. He
> went LD. His pal went down to cast EndureBreathe on him (not realizing that
> you cant cast/heal/buff LD players) and somehow he died - also LD. Oh well -
> back to something safe - killing Ogers.

What level are the Ogres? I'm always looking for out of the way spawns
to fight when things get crowded.


--
Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural Stupidity.
